meanings.sent1: She was outfasting her friends during Ramadan.
meanings.sent2: He always tries to outfast his siblings during Lent.
meanings.sent3: The competition was fierce, but she was determined to outfast everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to outfasting her previous record was truly inspiring.
meanings.sent5: The marathon runner's commitment to outfasting her opponents was unmatched.

meanings.definition: The act of fasting longer or more strictly than others.
meanings.sent1: His outfasting during the religious holiday was admirable.
meanings.sent2: She achieved the title of outfasting champion in the fasting competition.
meanings.sent3: The outfasting contest brought together people from different backgrounds.
meanings.sent4: The outfasting challenge pushed her to new limits of self-discipline.
meanings.sent5: The tradition of outfasting has been passed down for generations in her family.
